underlying_goal: Implement two modifications to a product pipeline: (1) remove AI output symbols from subtitle titles in STEP 1, and (2) make opening/closing sections independently configurable instead of all-or-nothing, across all affected pipeline steps.
brief_summary: User asked to remove output symbols from subtitles and make opening/closing independently configurable; the first task was completed and the second was planned with a detailed implementation plan across 3 files.
